definitions.example: good business depends on having good merchandise

definitions.definition: A commodity offered for sale; an article of commerce; a kind of merchandise.
The act or business of trading; trade; traffic.
To engage in trade; to carry on commerce.
To engage in in-store promotion of the sale of goods, as by display and arrangement of goods.
definitions.example: He started his career merchandising in a small clothing store chain.

definitions.definition: To engage in the trade of.
To engage in in-store promotion of the sale of.
definitions.example: He got hired to merchandise some new sporting goods lines.

definitions.definition: To promote as if for sale.
definitions.example: The record companies don't get as good a return on merchandising artists under contract.
